generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Net Lease Income = (Gross Lease Income + Lease Equalisation Credit/Charge)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Interest Income = Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits + Interest on Other Loans)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investment Income = (Interest + Dividends + Profit on Sale of Investments classified as Current + Profit on Sale of Other Investments)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Fund based income = (Net Lease Income + Hire Purchase Income + Bills Discounting Income + Interest Income + Investment Income + Other fund-based income) " do not tally.

Identity "Value of Fee Based Income = (Guarantee Fee + Underwriting Commission + Other Merchant Banking Income + Income from Brokering and syndication in bills/ICDs/Lease + Other fee-based income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Income from financial business = (Fund-Based Income+ Fee Based Income + Miscellaneous income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total income = (Total Income from Financial Business + Income from Non-Financial Business)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Interest Expense and other financing cost = (Interest paid on fixed deposits + Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits + Interest on credits from Banks + Interest on credits from Financial Institutions + Other Financing Charges)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Expenses = (Depreciation on Fixed Assets including Leased Assets + Interest Expense and other financing cost + Brokerage + Discount/charges on Bills rediscounted + Loss on Sale of Investments + Intangible assets amortised + Bad Debts written off + Provisions against Non-Performing Assets + Reversal of Income on NPAs + Provision for diminution in value of investments + Other provisions, if any + Operating Expenses + Expenses Relating to Non-Financial Business)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Profit before tax = (Total Income - Total expenses)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net Profit/Loss = (Profit before Tax -Provision for taxation)" do not tally.
All values should be positive.
Identity "Value of Operating expenses = (Employee costs + Other Administrative costs)" do not tally.
Value assertion not satisfied [ Total Credit to Real Estate should be equal to sum of 1. Fund based exposure and 2. Non fund based exposure]
Provision for standard assets' in Part 1 Sheet = 'Provision held for standard assets' in Part 9B Sheet.

Identity "Value of Amount of NPAs as at the end of the period = (Amount of NPAs as at the beginning of the period - Recoveries effected out of NPAs - Write offs effected out of NPAs + Additions to NPAs)" do not tally.
Amount of NPA provision for Quarter 4 in Part 9C Sheet = Total NPAs in Part 9B Sheet.
Amount Outstanding reported < or = Rs. 20000 Crore
Amount reported < or = Rs. 20000 Crore
Identity "Value of Amount Outstanding reported in Annex06 Sheet < or = Rs. 20000 Crore for each subscriber" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Amount Outstanding reported in Annex07 Sheet < or = Rs. 20000 Crore for each subscriber" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Amount Outstanding reported in Annex08 Sheet < or = Rs. 20000 Crore for each subscriber" do not tally.
Amount Outstanding reported should be < or = Rs. 20000 Crore.
Identity "Amount of loans and advances outstanding reported should be < or = Rs. 20000 Crore".
Identity "Percentage shareholding < or = 100% and > or = 1%" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Performing (i+ii) under column 'Loans & Advances Outstanding + Interest overdue' in Part 10 Sheet = Value of Standard assets under column 'Loans and Advances Outstanding + Interest Overdue in Part 9B Sheet" do not tally.
Provisions Held for Non-Performing Assets' in Part 01 Sheet under field 'Provisions' should match with 'Provision for NPA' in Part 9B Sheet.

Value reported in amount of "Accounts Restructured till end of the Quarter (Outstanding at end of the quarter" of Part 9D Sheet should match with amount reported in "Restructured Advances - Outstanding" of Part 9 Sheet
Please enter valid PAN if applicable, otherwise enter NA.
Please enter valid CIN if applicable, otherwise enter NA.

Validation not satisfied [If the user chooses ‘Individual’ option from ‘Type of Borrower’ dropdown then next column ‘Corporate Identification Number (CIN), if applicable, otherwise NA’ should be empty]
